column2: SELECT ra FROM mydb.target_galaxies2 WHERE dec = #) DECLARE @dec1 FLOAT = (SELECT dec FROM mydb.target_galaxies2 WHERE dec = #) DECLARE @theta1 FLOAT = (SELECT theta FROM mydb.target_galaxies2 WHERE dec = #) DECLARE @z1 FLOAT = (SELECT z FROM mydb.target_galaxies2 WHERE dec = #) -- DECLARE @name NVARCHAR (#) ; -- SET @name = # + @cnt SELECT p.ra, p.dec, z.z, z.zErr, p.petroMag_r -- INTO mydb. FROM PhotoObj p JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (@ra1, @dec1, @theta1) n ON n.objID = p.objID JOIN Photoz z ON z.objID = n.objID WHERE p.type = # AND z.z < @z1 + #*z.zErr AND z.z > @z1 - #*z.zErr AND z.zErr < # -- SET @cnt = @cnt + #; --END;
